actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 10- foot Emanation originating from the dretch. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.
